tool.name: Minfi Pheno

configfiles.configfile:
require("minfi", quietly = TRUE)
GRSet <- get(load('$input_grset'))
pheno <- pData(GRSet)
write.table(pheno, '$output_phenotab')

param.name: input_grset
param.label: Genomic Ratio Set
param.help: This class holds preprocessed data for Illumina methylation microarrays, mapped to a genomic location.

tool.help:
This tool is obtaining a phenotype information from GenomicRatioSet-class representing preprocessed data for Illumina methylation microarrays, mapped to a genomic location. Tool return sample-by-phenotype data frame with the following columns:
- sample ID - phenotype - additional information (if required)
